mapper.update: update role set name = #{name}, name_zh = #{nameZh} where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0;
update role set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, name, name_zh, updated_at, is_deleted from role where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0;

select id, name, name_zh, updated_at, is_deleted from role
is_deleted = 0
and name like '%${name}%'
and name_zh like '%${nameZh}%'
